alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 28 at 9:04PM CST until January 29 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of west central Illinois and central, east central, and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. A thin glaze of ice producing slippery spots are possible on bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Dense fog will substantially reduce visibilities, to one-quarter mile or less, resulting in hazardous driving conditions in some areas. Motorists are advised to use caution and slow down, as objects on and near roadways will be seen only at close range. In addition, since temperatures are sub-freezing, be alert for frost, making for slippery roads, especially on bridge decks.
